DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , active-control , parallel-group 13-week comparison IPX066 versus regular carbidopa-levodopa ( CD-LD ) . Prior randomization , subject stable regular LD regimen enter 3-week dose-adjustment period IR CD-LD , follow 6-week dose-conversion period IPX066 .
